text:
Saya menginap di mahogany hari ini tgl 25 desember 2022
Semua yg ada di foto tidak ada yg saya dapatkan, amenities room cuman ada gelas dan handuk. Tanpa pasta gigi, sikat gigi, saya beli sikat gigi dan pasta gigi sendiri. 
Keset dpn kamar mandi juga tidak ada. Istri saya keluar kamar mandi terpeleset karena licin tidak ada keset.
Air panas tidak menyala seharian, jadi saya blm mandi sampe malam ini. 
Saya mau tlpn ke FO ternyata pesawat tlp mya tidak ada kabel nya. Kok bisa ya??
Mau bikin kopi dengan pemanas dan lucunya tidak disediakan sendok untuk aduk kopi nya. Ada2 aja ini hotel nya.
Saya sangat kecewa dengan hotel ini.
Akhirnya saya komplain ke FO dan mereka bilang karena hari libur tidak ada manager yg incharge. Termasuk enginering untuk benerin air panas juga tdak ada.
Akhirnya saya di sambungkan dengan Hotel manager. 
Saya akan pindah ke hotel lain nya malam ini. 
Sangat kecewa dengan Mahogany hotel. Sy di suruh upgrade tp saya takut masalah yg sama muncul. 
Saya lbh baik pindah hotel.

Jujur saya kecewa sekali.
title: Very low standard

text: Saya menginap selama 4hari 3malam di hotel ini, stafnya sangat ramah dan membantu. Kamarnya nyaman, lokasinya jg strategis, harganya juga affordable, makanannya enak especially pizza anak saya sangat suka. Pasti balik lagi ke Mahogany

text:
Kami menginap di hotel ini selama 4 hari 3 malam dan mendapat harga yang cukup bagus dari tour guide kami (dibawah harga online). Kami ke Bali untuk pre-wedding dan tidak menyesal menginap disini.

Yang sangat berkesan dari hotel ini adalah pelayanannya yang sangat ramah dan sopan, sejak datang sudah dilayani dengan baik dan disajikan welcome drink berupa jus semangka. Selain itu, ada mini chapel yang terbuat dari kaca di rooftop hotel, sangat cantik. View dari rooftop hotel pun luar biasa, langsung menghadap ke Tol Laut Nusa Dua tanpa terhalang bangunan apa pun karena di belakang hotel ini tidak ada bangunan yang lebih tinggi. Kalau bisa bangun subuh, kita bisa melihat sunrise dari rooftop hotel karena bagian belakangnya menghadap ke Timur.

Kamar bersih dan ada balkonnya. Kolam renang sangat bersih dan terawat. Area restoran pun ditata dengan sangat bagus. Keseluruhan hotel sangat bersih dan rapi.

Sarapan sangat beragam menunya, tapi kurang berasa (hambar) untuk selera orang Indonesia. Meskipun begitu kita bebas menambahkan garam/lada yang sudah disediakan. Mulai dari teh, infused water, susu, kopi, jus jeruk ada. Roti, kue-kue, makanan berat, sereal semua disediakan.

Yang kurang mungkin hanya soal toilet karena meskipun bersih tetapi kurang segar, masih tercium sedikit bau toilet. Kemudian penggantian shampo dan sabun tidak reguler (harus diminta dulu). Tapi saat telepon ke resepsionis untuk minta pun tanggapan sangat cepat, hanya tiga menit sudah diantarkan.

Untuk lokasi cukup strategis karena sangat dekat dengan tol laut dan Bandara Ngurai Rai. Di seberang dan samping hotel terdapat banyak pedagang kaki lima sehingga kalau malam malas berkendara, bisa langsung makan disitu. Cafe hotel pun melayani pemesanan sampai malam (cafe ini dekorasinya juga unik dan bagus, mengambil tema baseball kalau tidak salah).

Secara keseluruhan, pengalaman menginap di hotel ini sangat menyenangkan. Apakah saya mau kembali kesini? Ya, mungkin nanti setelah saya puas mencoba hotel-hotel unik di Bali lainnya atau rindu pemandangan rooftop disini.
title: Pelayanan Sangat Baik dan Ramah

Good customer service - close up to the mark.  Only problem is with FOOD.  The restaurant is having limited and rigid menu and the breakfast being served also is not up to the mark.  The swimming pool is being maintained very nicely.  It was great; staying at Mahogany.  Special appreciation to Mr.Dishan, who arranged ultra swift check in at about 12:00 am and also managed to get a big pack of food from KFC at that odd hour.  Three cheers and Kudos.

text: I have no idea how this place can have this rate in the internet. People almost don’t speak English. I stayed one day and came on reception about 20 times to ask to wash my laundry starting at 12:00 when I check in to make it morning the next day. At 16:00 they finally sent someone and guess what? they didn’t wash it and told me next day morning. So I had to make very long flight back home in dirty cloths. Also we had our driver-taxi who we asked to pick us up and hotel forbade the driver to ride on the parking inside hotel to pick us up so we had to bring all our heavy luggage to the road. Thanks but this service is horrible. Highly not recommend
title: Horrible

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guests, 

First of all we would like to apologize regarding your experience at Mahogany Boutique Hotel Nusa Dua. All your feedback is seriously taken, and we would take this criticism as a constructive feedback. 

We will continually train our team so that it will meet every of our valued guests expectations, and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience that you have to go through. 

In our defense, any online Taxi is prohibited to come inside the hotel , considering the local government regulations that have persist for a several years now. However we always advise our guest to be picked up in the nearest mini markets if they would still like to order online taxis. 

All in All, please accept our sincerest apologies. 

Mahogany Boutique Hotel

text:
The Mahogany Hotel is situated on a very busy dual carriageway but don’t let that fact put you off staying in one of their chic rooms.

The Home Run Sports bar behind the hotel serves good food which was handy as we arrived late in the evening. 

Top tip: we found a lovely lady called Lidya nearby who runs her own laundry service. She even collects & returns your items!

Minor issues you may want to address:

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Mahogany is not too far off from the airport, it takes roughly 10-15mins drive to get here.
Our stay in Mahogany Hotel was pleasant and positive, the staffs were really nice, welcoming and accommodating. They always wore a smile and do what they can to help you.

Sleep quality was great and the room were pretty big and spacious. They also have quite a few cable channels in case you decide to stay in to watch TVs and take a relaxing day off.

We tried some food from their menu and really liked the Fried Noodles, it was tasty and of good portion.

If you need some recommendations for local food, turn left when you get to the main road after exiting the compound, you will find some shops along the road that sells local food and also 24 convenience store to get your beers/chips/ciggs/etc.
We tried a few of these local shops for dinner, they were cheap and decent!

One of the shop that we revisited to get more food was Tomo Roso [Photo Provided], you will be able to find the shop further down the road if you keep walking the same direction. Their fried rice were really affordable and they tasted pretty good.

Location-wise, Mahogany is located close to Nusa dua, but also not too far off from Kuta.

One of the negative experience i remember having while in Mahogany was the sewage smell that comes out from the shower drain pipes when we first got in. The smell did not stay long and went away after awhile. The smell did however reappear on the third day but it went away after awhile. Not a deal breaker but just something to note.

All in all, i think Mahogany is a affordable hotel that has decent amenities, some nice food from their menu, pretty accessible to convenience items/stores/food shop in its surroundings. I would recommend this hotel if you have a driver booked (taking single trips taxi will be too costly), if not, the hotel has a number of drivers that are also available for hire.
We hired one from them (because the first driver we hired and got his contact off the internet was severely lacking) and he was GREAT, i would recommend him in a heartbeat to anyone going to Bali. 

+ Nice food from menu (especially fried noodles)
+ Spacious and sizable room
+ Great sleep quality
+ Warm friendly staffs
+ Good choice of cable channels
+ Decent location with convenience/food stores nearby also

- sewage smell that comes and goes from time to time

hit the [helpful vote] button if you feel that this review was helpful, and feel free to drop me a PM if you need the contact to the driver. i'll get back to them when i'm back!
title: 4 night stay..

text:
This Hotel is beautiful for the price- the pool setting is lovely and especially when not peak season the hotel is a lovely spot to relax and get away from all the chaos. 

The staff are lovely and try to help as best they can - the only thing i would say is that they don't all know that much about the area which can be confusing and not that helpful at times. For example, i once asked about the distance to get to a place in Bali and i was told it was much closer than it actually was resulting in a very expensive taxi fare. 
I think it would really benefit this hotel if all of the staff were kept highly knowledgable about good beaches, restaurants etc. 

The hotel is located in a spot with very limited to see via walking, the beach is somewhat close and they offer a free shuttle there but at really scattered times so it can be difficult to plan around that. 

Besides that i absolutely loved staying here and would stay here again. The rooms are really nice and was just an overall great atmosphere. 

Thanks specifically to Tessa and the staff  for their kind and helpful welcoming
title: Beautiful Staff, Lovely Hotel- Not ideal location

text:
It was a great place to stay. We liked our room as it was in the middle and the overlooking was great. We loved the view outside. The balcony is a plus especially if you want to have fresh air. 

Breakfast was okay. Nescafe Coffee Machine is available. Soup was great! Fruits, veggies, pancakes, rice, scrambled eggs, mushrooms are some options during breakfast. Juice was also available. 

We love the pizza calabraze from Homerun Sports Cafe! Mojito is nice too! 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻

You can contact recep/operator if you wanted to rent a van with their recommended driver to visit some places while in Bali. They also have packages to offer in case you want to do some water sports activities. We went to Uluwatu to watch the fire dance and take some pictures of the beautiful place. The driver was very helpful, (Wayan-whatsapp+62 813-3859-7200). He speaks veey good english! Definitely recommendable! Thank you!

There are nearby convenience stores around the hotel just in case you need to get something. 

The staff were very helpful and emphathetic with us when we reached the place. Thanks to Novan and Dias and to the rest of the team. We planned to stay in Bali for 5days but it was shortened to 3days as our flight was diverted due to some issues at the airport. Thanks to Tessa and her team for taking care of us. Thanks for the mugs too! ☺️

Thanks very much! We hope to be back in Bali with no hiccups!
title: Nice place to stay

I got so chilled that after a couple of days at the Nusa Dua beach I hung around the hotel and just relaxed. If you do want to venture further there's a free shuttle bus that runs about four times a day to said beach. If you fancy one of the many trips on offer in and around Bali they will help you sort it out. Nothing is to much for them and it's always done with a genuine smile. text: The staff is themes valuable asset of this hotel. Everyone was extremely helpful and kind to us from the moment we arrived till the time we left. The location is perfect as it connects to the south and north of the island easily, with lots of shops around in case you need groceries, etc. Good breakfast in the morning with cold and warm options, and we really loved the pool, located in the middle of the property. Food is really good, with delicious dishes (we tried quite few of them) and with sizeable portions. The rooftop with a bar in one side and a chapel for weddings on the other side, has beautiful views of the bay. Great place to stay if you are coming with your family, which was our case, specially for the value of the night.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I really liked this hotel. It is relatively good value for Nusa Dua (which is expensive, on the whole) and the staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The rooms come with a small balcony and have tasteful fittings. There is a kettle in the room. The swimming pool area is rather lovely. There is also a rooftop bar with a modern wedding chapel. While not huge, the hotel is bigger than expected.

Cleanliness is generally OK but could be improved further in corners and behind/under things. The curtain in my room was quite dirty with something black but had not been replaced.

There is a shuttle to the beach and shopping area in Nusa Dua (Bali Collection) – you have to sign up for a particular time. It’s like an expensive but poorly planned shopping and dining tourist outdoor mall stretching over quite a long area. There is a Starbucks and Baskin Robbins (both more expensive than in the US) and a department store which has a nice selection of local crafts (like silk and cotton batik sarongs) at higher than usual prices. Dining is plentiful but again, expensive. Very few local options for food. The beach itself is rather nice and surprisingly empty (Aug 2016). If you walk about half an hour down the beach you find yourself near some of the high-end hotels which pretend they have a private beach (but they don’t, it’s public, so that’s a good place to perch). There is a kind of walking path that joins all the hotels and some cafes just parallel to the beach, so you walk through their gardens. Nice walk or good for getting a drink/snack/coconut water.

For those who are budget-conscious, Nusa Dua is an annoying place to stay with nearly no public transport. The hotel itself, while lovely, is located on the main access road, so in the middle of nowhere from a tourist perspective though there are some convenience stores (turn left as you exit for IndoMart just next to Pop hotel) and a good selection of local warungs to eat cheaply. But you either have to rent a motorbike or rely on taxis, which are expensive. Call Bluebird taxis as the hotel driver will charge you more. A trip to Kuta is around 100,000 one way. From the airport the official rate is around 150,000 though a metered taxi should be a little less.
title: Lovely staff, modern hotel, location not ideal

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I really think the staff at the Mahogany are so friendly and helpful, every day they greet you with a smile and they do try hard to make your experience special. The Owner of the hotel and the manager are also very friendly introducing themselves on the first day and talking to me each day making sure i was happy with the hotel. The hotel has security staff at the front of the property and they patrol 24 hours and are very friendly and again greet you with a smile and wave each time you come into or out of the property. I had a great driver "Bobby" who showed me the sights and was also very happy to take me anywhere at anytime of the day or night and for me i found he was very reasonable on price, for a full day $30 AUD for me in Rockhampton QLD i would pay this for one small journey in a taxi. The pool was always clean as was the property and the sports bar was and restaurant are very nice also. I did have some small issues including hot water not reliable and free WI-Fi was a waste of time, also house keeping needed some attention to detail and breakfast food was not always at a safe temperature i did speak to the manger regarding these issues. Overall i really enjoyed my stay at the Mahogany it was quiet and very friendly and i would highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
title: Friendly Staff very nice property

owner_response.text:

My cousin and I had a ladies getaway here and if it is value for money and relaxation in a boutique setting that you are looking for, then look no further! The hotel itself was brand new at the time of our stay and we had the place to ourselves most of the time. A beautiful oasis in the middle of the city, with sunset views and architectural ambience. We miss Mahogany and look forward to returning with family as they have an amazing chapel on the rooftop with skyline views!

text: I had to move hotels last minute and the mahogany hotel was able to accommodate. The minute I got there I felt so welcomed by the staff. They were so friendly and continually asked me what I needed and if I had plans. I only had 3 nights there and after 2 months of traveling I wanted to relax by the pool. I happened to be the only one there and the staff was fantastic, played great Music and were helpful when I had questions. I was lazy and stayed by the pool all day and ate at the restaurant every night. They were sad to see me go and I was sad to leave! So glad I met these wonderful people at this fantastic hotel! Could not believe I paid the price I did for such a clean and friendly place. I will  DEFINITELY recommend it to my friends and family. Thanks for such a lovely stay!!

text:
We stayed at the beautiful Mahogany Hotel 7 nights and loved every moment. 
On arrival we were welcomed with drinks and it was a quick check in. As this was our first time in Bali, accompanied with older parents, I thought that the location would be perfect for us and it was. The hotel is close to all main attractions in Nusa Dua & Kuta. Ricky, the hotels shuttle driver is happy and always on time to take guests to and from the Bali Collection, he is an asset to the Mahogany Hotel.
All the staff in all departments at the Mahogany made us all feel so welcomed. All the staff on reception were very helpful and professional. Housekeeping staff do an amasing job, all areas of the hotel are spotless and so are the rooms. The towels, bed linen & even the pool towels smell beautiful.
At mahoganys, the restaurant is called Homerun 42. We had many lunches and dinner there and the meals were great every time. There is a large selection for the mornings buffet breakfast, which was always delicious. Metu, Made Dodi & Deta and all restaurant staff are an asset to the Mahogany, they were always friendly and a delight to speak with.
Thank you for making our stay in Bali so special, We will be back for sure!
title: Fantastic 7 night stay!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We booked our 7 night stay at the Mahogany Hotel after reading other reviews on Trip Advisor. We were very pleased with our stay, the hotel is new and fresh, with a beautiful pool area and a nice attached restaurant which serves a variety of food and drink at reasonable prices. 

The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful, always greeting us with a smile. There was a complementary shuttle to the beach/bali collection and the driver Ricky also took us to the airport at the conclusion of our staff. 

The breakfast buffet was decent, there was a mix of western and Asian food which changed slightly each day for variety. The location was pretty central in Nusa Dua, on the main road, not too far from the high end resorts and beaches on the east of the island, and not too far from Kuta/Seminyak to the west. There were cheap local restaurants and minimarts within walking distance, but unless you have your own transport like we did (hired a scooter for 70k/day) you will have to rely on taxis to get you anywhere.

We can happily recommend this hotel and would not hesitate to stay here again.
title: Great mid-range hotel at budget prices

All in all we are thankful you chose us for your seven nights stay, and we all can't wait to reunite if you happen to visit Bali in the future!

It is ideally located.  The hotel runs the schedule shuttle and will provide you with the beach towel anyway. I would recommend you to hire a motorcycle. It is easy to travel everywhere. 

The staff is friendly, they tried to greet you and talk to you. I had a couple ot times having dinner in their cafe. Their cafe's menu is not really bad, I had their nasee goring, mee goring... it  is tastly, the price is normal, too.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed for 12 nights in February, the hotel has a cool modern vibe and is very clean. Rooms have a large bathroom with hot shower, air conditioning and it works very well, all have a balcony and are comfy, roomy. The cafe meals were excellent, enough of a selection to see you through 2 weeks, as was breakfast around the pool area.
As others have alluded to the hotel is in Mumbal a suburb of Nusa Dua. For me this did not prove a problem as you can get to anywhere with a driver. Being on a holiday I spent quite a few days just veging out around the pool in the bar or in the room catching up on movies, they have fantastic cable. The hotel is close to several convience stores and is on the Bali collection bus route.
Overall a very relaxing, affordable and pleasant stay which as with all hotels can be attributed to kind helpful and professional staff and management, friendly and willing to go that extra little bit. Can highly recommend and will definitely be back thanks for everything
title: Value and a coolmodern vibe

Dear Richard H., 

Thank you for your review at Trip Advisor. We are sorry that you and your wife are somewhat dissapointed with our location.However, we would like to clearly justify that we are not a villa, nor, a five-star hotel which is pretty self explainable through our room rates. 
Mahogany is a small, yet quaint three star Boutique Hotel, that has a far more affordable room rates than the five star exclusive resorts within the BTDC, Nusa Dua area. Although we are rather flattered to be compared to such expensive, high-end, luxurious resorts we regret to say that we can't be compared to such hotels, and we  genuinely apologize if we  gave you that kind of perception or image.

We are pleased to hear that all of our staff treated you well, and we  apologize regarding our location. We will strive to become better in the future. We sincerely hope you & your wife enjoyed the rest of your stay in Bali.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This hotel was lovely to stay at, even though it was on a busy Main Street. It was still tranquil, not many guests when we were staying so we enjoyed that even more. 
We could relax by the pool on the comfy lounge chairs, the pool was sparkling everyday and was cleaned everyday. 
The hotel offers a free shuttle bus to Bali collection which is a big shopping centre, plenty of things to buy and a 2min walk to the lovely beach, lots of things to see. We took advantage of this free offer, it was great to see. 
The hotel breakfast was excellent the best breakfast I had in any hotel. The options where; spring rolls, fried rice, scrambled eggs, omelette, sausages, potatoes, chicken wings, noodles and much much more!!! Toast pancakes and health options such as fruit and porridge. It's worth while going for the breakfast included.
It felt like a  dinner meal rather than a breakfast, I thought breakfast was excellent!!!. 
The rooms where comfortable and clean, fresh lining everyday and rooms made up beautifully. If we weren't out and about looking at the sites, we enjoyed cooling down in our air con room and watching the fox movie channels and sometimes have food brought to our room using room service. 
The food available at the home run was very tasty and great value, a medium size pizza for about $5 AUD, great value!!!.
The staff were amazing, very friendly!! and the service was out standing.
We had a lovely stay here and would stay again
Thank you :)
title: Relaxing and friendly stay

title: Not quite Nusa Dua

owner_response.text:
Dear Mark J.,

First of all we would like to say thank you for choosing us for your recent stay in Bali, and sincerest apologies that we didn't meet your expectations. Glad that you enjoyed the cold beers from Homerun Sport Cafe as well as the pool table. We will take this feedback as a constructive criticism, which we will utilize as a tool to improve in the future.

However, even though we are rather flattered and honored that you compared us to five-star, luxurious, and exclusive hotels such as The Nusa Dua Beach, The Westin, and Hyatt, we regret to once again remind you and everyone else that we are just a three star, quaint Boutique Hotel, that has no direct access to the Beach. We do have a view of the beautiful Mangroves, Bay View and Bali Mandara Toll Road which could be seen from all of our Family Rooms, Deluxe Rooms, and Nibiru Rooftop Bar.

On behalf on all employee within Mahogany, we would like to apologize if we give an image / perception that we are similar to the hotels you mentioned above. Although from the room rates itself from various online travel agent should explain the difference since our room rates are approximately seven times more affordable than the Hotels above. 

Once again thank you for giving us a chance, and hope if we do still have the chance to welcome you again in the future, we've improved and will meet your expectations. Meanwhile, hope you had a pleasant time in Bali.

Mahogany Boutique Hotel
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I stayed in Mahogany hotel during my visit to Bali on Dec 2015. The hotel was very good. A special mention to the staff who were all smiles always. text:
My husband and I spent a week at this hotel for Christmas.  The hotel looked pretty new. The staff were very friendly and always smiling which was lovely. The rooms were modern and the bed was comfortable. Also the shower was powerful which was great.
Although the hotel was a bit far away from restaurants the hotel put on a free shuttle every 2 hours from 11am to 7pm to the Bali Collection shopping mall which had shops, restaurants and spas. 
We ate lunch a few times at the hotel which was good. 
The pool was clean and the sun beds were comfortable. 
Overall a lovely stay at the mahogany hotel

The service and staff were attentive and professional, and everyone spoke good English. 

The kids loved the pool--watch out for the strong sunlight around noon.

text:
My family and I stayed at the Mahogany hotel for 9 nights from the 1st to the 9th of October and were impressed with the facilities itself and the hospitality.   The hotel staff made us feel welcomed from the moment we stepped into the hotel.      

This hotel is new and modern and has been opened for about 12months.  It’s a good size boutique hotel with a few eating areas, cafes giving sufficient space for privacy.  The Chef is from Netherlands and his team has planned and delivered  a menu which is tasty with a standard comparable with other larger chain of hotels. 

The location is away from the main Nusa Beaches and for those usually staying in Nusa Dua this is the main attraction.  However, after talking to the Mahogany management and providing some customer feedback for their business growth, if they partner-up with one of the Beach Clubs along the Nusa Beach which offers a range of facilities to the walk-in public, this partnering relationship will help each business grow and the location of the hotel shouldn’t be a factor.  

In summary for peace and quiet this is the hotel for you. The food and facilities is sufficient for a couple or a small family and if the hotel adds other free shuttle services to outsides businesses and partner up with others then everyone wins! Thanks Ben and his team for a great stay, we hope to visit the hotel in the future. Good luck.
title: Nice Boutique Modern Hotel in Nusa Dua

text: Good quality hotel with a great breakfast. We stayed for 2 nights and used this as our base to explore Nusa Dua and the smith of Bali. It was a bit of a challenge to find (we hired a car) so drove up and down twice before finding it. The hotel bar, pool area and reception have a lovely feel, and although set on the main road, it does feel separate from the hustle and traffic. We had a room overlooking the pool with a balcony. Room was clean and well laid out. It was about a 25 minute drive from the airport, and 10 minutes to the Nusa Dua resort. We wanted to explore this part of Bali without the 5* price tag so this hotel was perfect for us. There isn't a huge selection of places on the doorstep but good enough and taxis are cheap and easy to get with the help of hotel staff. With a car, you can travel down to Uluwatu without too much bother. We had 2 fantastic breakfasts here. Buffet style with a different selection each day. Very impressed. Great value.
title: Great value with great breakfast

text: We stayed for 3 nights at the Mahogany Hotel in a family suite with our 2 kids (8 and 4). The family suite had one double and one single bed, and we requested additional bedding for our 4yo so she could sleep on a little soft bench that was in the room, which we placed in between our beds and was perfect for her. Staff was very accomodating to help. The place is lovely. The view from our room was amazing. The pool is great and the kids loved it, ideal depth for kids. Plus they had a large blow up Flamingo which our 8yo loved playing with. The breakfast buffet has a good range of food and the Dutch chef made 'oliebollen' especially for us as I am Dutch and the kids love them. We had dinner at the restaurant twice and the food was really good, very tasty, probably the best I've tasted in Bali. We did a few afternoon trips to Jimbaran Beach and Balangan Beach which were both lovely and not that long in a cab. Our flight was leaving Denpasar late that night but we were able to store our suitcases and bags that day at the hotel and they also allowed us a late check out wich was great! Only two things I note, one is that the music was aweful. Lots of Ed Sheran and other pop music, quite loud too, which really doesn't suite the lovely atmosphere of the hotel. I would really recommend this to be changed by the staff to a quieter background music. Another thing I note is that the hotel is quite open and the steps on the side of the hotel to go up to your room have a very wide railing. Same on the balcony. A small child could easily fit through that and fall down. So if you have a specific adventurous child or a climber you need to be aware of this. But we had a great time, perfect to relax for a few days on our way back from Europe to Melbourne.
title: Great experience

owner_response.text:

Not only that, we would really consider about what we can do about our wide railing! 

Once again Thank You, and hope you had an amazing time here in Bali.

Mahogany Hotel

text: I found this hotel from tripadvisor. I traveled solo for business purpose in Nusa Dua area. This is a new hotel I presumed. Clean building. Nice room. A balcony in every room, which is really nice. A small swimming pool but only 1,2 meter depth. The staff are really helpful. 5 stars staff. As an amateur road cyclists, I brought my bike, they help me to assembled my bike from my box, also gave me special room to keep my bike. Since I didn't trust the security where my bike gonna sit in the regular motorbike parking area. The breakfast was okay, what do you expect for a hotel this price. A Nescafe coffee machine, tea, cereal, milk, fried rice, noodle, salad, bread, butter, toast machine, jam, fresh fruits, scrambled egg, omelette, sausages, more than I need. The taste was above average for that price point. The only weak point for this hotel was the wifi. It was free, but they gave a same username and password dor everyone. As a techie guy, I knew they use mikrotik router and First Media internet provider, but unfortunately they didn't limit the bandwidth for the user. So the speed really fast during the work hour, but after 6pm, when everybody use the internet, the speed really bad. As low as 6kbps. Other than the internet issue, I would love to stay in this hotel anytime in the future. Fix it dude, just call your local tech guy, you can fix it less than 1 hour.
title: Great Hotel with Superb Staff

owner_response.text:
Hi Hari Nugroho,

Can't thank enough for taking your time to write a review of our Mahogany Hotel. So glad that you find our hotel clean, enjoyed our simple yet hearty breakfast, and find us an absolute value for money! So glad that our staff helped to assemble your bike & provided you a special room to store it!

However, we would like to genuinely apologize for the slow wi-fi. We would definitely pass your constructive feedback to our IT Department, and get it fixed as soon as possible. Hopefully on your next stay in Mahogany Hotel the Wi-Fi connection will be superb!

Thanks once again, and take care! Don't hesitate to contact us if you happen to visit Bali!

Mahogany Hotel

text: If you are like me, you don't want to be treated as VIP with no interaction with your hosts. Mahogany Hotel is the antithesis of this kind of stale, sterile treatment. Instead you are taken in as family and cared for like a houseguest. My son and I were pleasantly surprised with the immaculate room, great service, and excellent 5 star menu, but even more impressed with the kindness and sincere attention given to each and every detail of our stay. We commend you, Mahogany staff, for becoming our family in Bali. We'll be back.
title: Like family

owner_response.text:

text:
I extended my stay to 6 nights and did'nt want to leave this Hotel.  WOW  the bed was so comfortable, the bathroom with the rain shower so refreshing, the balcony to enjoy the view of the sea and the tollway in the distance with a lovely breeze was a treat when you wanted to leave the efficient air conditioned room.  I treated myself to the family suite for a few extra dollars and was amazed with the 180 degree view from the large windows that also opened.   Lots of TV channels to cater to a lot of nationalities.  An international adaptor in the room to recharge your mobile, ipad etc great reading lights situated on the bedhead.  Bottled water was replenished in your room fridge daily, it was just so easy staying here.
Nusa Dua beach less than 10 minutes by car, my dentist at BIMC also a short distance from the Mahogany Hotel.   Lots of supermarkets nearby as well as warungs.    The food was good too.  I enjoyed a light meal with a friend and the breakfast buffet was adequate but very tasty.  The Chef and all the staff are very friendly and I felt welcomed and had a wonderful relaxing stay.  The Musicians that played on Friday Night were very good also.   Good Luck to Mahogany Hotel I wish them great business because they deserve it.   I will be going back to stay for sure.

Having recently stayed in the Mahogany hotel in nusa dua for almost 2 weeks i thought i would share my enthusiasm for the hotel so that others may give it a go and enjoy the experience in the way that i did. 
Very well trained friendly staff and fantastic owners who graced the breakfast times checking everything was ok for their guests sets this hotel apart from others. The personal touches and impression the hotel has left me with makes me want to highly recommend it to all my friends. The hotels design uses top quality granite,marbles and travertines to name a few and really makes you feel like you are staying in a more expensive hotel. The hotel is new,fresh and clean and should not be overlooked for those wanting to stay in the nusa dua area. 
The breakfast menu differs each day and the head chef from holland is commonly on hand to take in feed back ref the food along with the owners themselves making the overall experience a great one. A great sports bar is within the hotel offering loads of promo specials on both food and drink. All in all a 10 out of 10 experience had by both myself and my wife. Thanks Mahogany hotel nusa dua

text:
We spent 2 nights in the mahogany hotel in august 2015. 
the hotel is situated a little bit off the center of kuta, to the south in nusa dua, about 20min to the airport and 10 min to the beach by shuttle.
The hotel is modern with a nice pool area. The staff is super welcoming. 
Bluebird taxi (running by meter) available in max. 10 minutes after phonecall.
The rooms are not to big, but clean and with a good hot shower. 
The main flaw is the noise by the mainroad just outside the hotel and the really loud AC's in the room and the vents outside on the balkony. Maybe depending on the room. 
Another flaw is the bad wifi connection, just in lobby really usable.
The price was really cheap, 394000 rupiah (about 27euro/night) for a room and breakfast (which is also recommandable).
title: Good price for some luxery feeling

text: The hotel and staff made this one of our most memorable and thoroughly enjoyable family holidays. The staff are so kind, willing and attentive and can't do enough for you. This is a family owned and run boutique hotel with a warm welcome and genuine family atmosphere.  The hotel is very clean, modern and made with very high quality natural materials such as granite, marble and mahogany. It's in a great location close to the quiet beaches of Nusa Dua, the shopping at the Bali Collection(free shuttle bus ) and about 20 mins to Kuta which has a more lively beach and nightlife. Nothing was too much trouble and the executive chef Sebastian arranged a for specially prepared menu for a family meal which was set up on the roof terrace and our own staff provided for the evening - the food was very good and a mixture of local Balinese and more western dishes which were all specially prepared to order. This made for a very special evening. Breakfast was buffet style with a range of traditional, continental and Indonesian dishes which were regularly replenished and the chef was happy to do bespoke orders. There was a good pool and the sports bar has 5 large screen TVs where you can watch virtually any sport you would like. The sports bar also serves a very good range of snacks and meals. The whole experience was excellent value for money and I would recommend this hotel without reservation.
title: Great hotel, fantastic staff  and excellent value for money.

text:
My family have a wonderful stay at Mahogany hotel for six days. This hotel is highly recommended. The overall comment for the hotel: Great quality and good value for money.

Firstly, the hotel staffs are extremely friendly and nice. They provided the pick-up service from the airport. The staffs hold our names on a sign with a big smile welcoming us. When we met the staffs in airport, they are just too kind for helping us to hold our big luggages to the car. We are very impressed with their kindness at our first arrival.

After placing our luggages in the room, since we haven't still planned our schedule for the trip, we just have some places in our mind. We talked to the staffs and would like to have a chat with them on the trip schedule. They are not hesitate to give us advices. They gave us a map and give us ideas on what exactly the best places to visit in Bali. Such as rock bar, potato head, mamas restaurant. They also recommended some local Indonesian restaurant to us.( but i dun know the name of it). Overall, they gave us a great help on planning the trip. Thanks again, the staffs in Mahogany Hotel!!! You guys are awesome!!!!

So let me conclude the overall benefits of staying the hotel;
- All staffs can speak English and some of them can even speak mandarin 
- cozy room
- the bathroom is clean and big
- location is good and close to the place playing water sports as well as turtle island
- the breakfast is well-served. Western and Asian food are served. The fried noodles is so yummy! 
- staffs are so friendly and nice. Give great recommendation on the places! 
- nice view from the roof 
- Great value for money

I will definitely come back when I visit Bali again. If you do not have a big budget for the accommodation, I can truly say this hotel is the best one in nusa dua hotel!
title: Best hotel! Excellent and great value!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I booked on this hotel several months prior to our travel dates (huge thanks to Ms. Ilma, the supervisor for being so helpful and professional when answering my inquiry emails and personally assisting us during our stay) 

At first, I was just looking for some inexpensive place to stay until I found this hotel. This hotel is pretty far from Kuta, the hub of Bali, but for a person like me, the location is just perfect -far from the noise and such.

Quality and Value. Perhaps those are the words that could sum up how I felt with this hotel on my first days of stay. But as time gone by, I realized that it was really more than that. I couldn't put them in words, but perhaps, being someone coming from a busy and fast-paced country like Japan, being in this hotel added peace and fulfillment in my short stay in Bali.

The moment I stepped foot outside the arrival lobby of the airport, two staff from the hotel, carrying our names, approached us and welcomed us with a warm smile. The reception staff who welcomed us when we checked in are no different. They are so kind, friendly and fun to talk with. Its as if they were there as friends, rather that people who are just working to make a living.

I chose the ocean-view deluxe room. I didn't know that it'll be so spacious. But I didn't mind. The room is clean, the amenities, everything. And yeah, the view from my veranda is breathtaking <3 The breakfast is well-served. Fresh and healthy.

 I also liked the fact that the owner of the hotel himself often visits and greets the guests. It is so heartwarming. It was my first time visiting Bali, and yet for some reason, this hotel felt like a home for me even just for our few days of stay. 

Perhaps, these words are not enough to express how much I enjoyed my time on this hotel. Come and see it for yourself :) I really can't wait to fly back to Bali and meet everyone again.
title: Felt like HOME in a paradise.

text: I stayed here for a total of 17 days with my first cousin,It was a mummy's trip away..a break from our hectic lives,we were here longer than intended due to the volcanoe ash that had terminated all flights to Australia,Normally you would be horrified but these guys were amazing!!!!!! We were so comfortable and relaxed that we didn't mind staying the additional days.The hotel is SO CLEAN!!!!!,The FOOD IS AMAZIIIIIINNNGGG!!! The first couple of days we would catch a taxi to Kuta to eat,but once we ate there at the restaurant It was the best choice we made! We ordered room service all the time "capsulon" was a combination of fries cheese and salad which was devine!!! Also the Dutch croquettes,😩😩😩 I miss the food!!! The OWNER is the most down to earth person he would conversation with us during lunch he is very humble and has an amazing sense of humour 😂😂😂😂...This is a true reflection of the hotel it's beautiful!!!!,The staff were so kind,friendly,respectful and felt like family,we would conversate on a daily 😃😃😃 as well.Our rooms were kept clean even though their just meant to fix the beds the staff would go out of their way to fold clothing and adjust things around the room.It was just an amazing experience being in Bali but staying here made it even more memorable.When you walk in notice the architecture of the hotel,the design,the little fixtures in your room.You truly feel like a piece of nature is in your room.Hard to explain but when you get there you'll experience it yourself!! 😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄 Loved it here,will be back next year!!! (Shops are two minutes away,the city is 20 minutes away it is in the best place away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta city but is also close too!)

At first, we decided to stay in this hotel since it only a few minutes drive from my cousin house and office and it turned out that we made really good choice staying on this hotel. When we arrived in the evening the staff greeted us friendly and we got our compliment drinks right away. The lobby is nice and very close to the breakfast room and swimming pool that the best feature I love in this hotel. The room was big and the each room has it's own veranda with nice view facing the Benoa Bay floating bridge. I woke up early and went to the breakfast room too early at 6:00 pm and the girl their in the breakfast room try to prepare breakfast right away even though other staffs were not there yet. The breakfast was very good with many options to choose such as oriental breakfast(fried rice,fried noodle, dim sum, rice porridge, and Indonesian gado gado) and western style breakfast(mashed potatoes with sausages, croisant and danish breads, white/wheat breads, pancake and salads).They also provide the guest nestle coffee machine which I thought brilliant.
I was also surprised since the hotel is quite new, the guest relation(Mrs. Dewi) approached everybody in the breakfast room and asked how do they think about their room and their service.Then later on I got to know the manager hotel and the owner as well. The owner at the moment prepare to accommodate family travelers not a big group tour since they are new and would like to have family theme also for the establishment and I think this is the best segmentation strategy as well. Sometimes big group tour would distract our staying in hotel.
 The swimming pool is open 24 hours and I love this. I am coming back to have family holiday this coming August and would love to stay in this hotel again.

text: I would highly recommend a stay at the Mahogany Hotel Nusa Dua Bali. It was exceptional. The attention to detail and thoughtfulness of the staff was amazing. The general atmosphere around the hotel was always upbeat and friendly. I especially enjoyed both the experience and the food. It was beautiful and relaxing and again the staff were very attentive. Our three night stay was a great way. This hotel is perfect for the single traveller as well as anyone else but I picked this hotel knowing that it has everything you could want in terms of sport cafe, lounge bars, location etc and never feel lonely or bored whilst travelling on my own. The free shuttle takes you from the hotel to the bali collection and has lots of restaurants, coffee shops around bali collection. We will be back! Thank you to the Mahogany for a fabulous stay.
title: Thank you to the Mahogany for a fabulous stay

text:
We have stayed here for 3 days so far & our experience has been wonderful!! This hotel is quite new (within a year I believe) & the facilities are clean & modern with Balinese touches making for a very beautiful, tranquil & relaxing place to stay!! The Mahogany is excellent value for your money!! We stayed in the very spacious Family Room with a beautiful view & large windows (that can be closed with a screen) complete with bathroom, large TV, mini safe, an extra small sink, kettle & mini fridge that included complimentary bottled waters. There is free wifi & AC in the room as well. All facilities are well kept & clean & the staff have all been exceptional!! 

The staff are very approachable, extremely friendly & responsive to any questions or inquiries that you have about the hotel, the culture, the area & pretty much anything in general!! The wonderful staff contribute largely to the great atmosphere at the Mahogany.

Our accommodations included complimentary breakfast buffet every morning. So far, we have only eaten breakfast at the hotel but we found the food tasty & enjoyable!! There is great variety: some western breakfast (omelettes, salad, fresh fruits, cooked veggies etc.) as well as some local choices. We had a great chat with the head chef at the hotel & he mentioned that he receives a list of the guests & where they are from & attempts to cater the breakfast choices accordingly which we believe goes above & beyond what one normally receives from a hotel!! All the cooked food & fresh cut fruit are kept in covered containers, and there is choices of juice, coffee & teas. 

The location of the hotel is just within the boundaries of the Nusa Dua. It is a bit farther from the more touristy areas but they do offer a free shuttle to the Bali Collective Mall every 2 hours if you desire to go there. Otherwise, they will call a taxi service for you & the cost of a taxi deeper into Nusa Dua or other areas such as Jimbaran is quite inexpensive! 

Overall, we would most definitely recommend staying at the Mahogany hotel!! If we were coming back to the Nusa Dua area, the Mahogany hotel would be our first pick!! The exceptional staff, tranquil & peaceful atmosphere, clean & modern facilities & our overall great experience, and all for a great value make you feel very spoiled & so very welcome to this beautiful area!!
title: Great Experience, Great Value & Wonderful Staff!!

Early check in was allowed.  the room was clean. the shower was excellent. the view of sea and the toll road was quite nice from the 3rd of 4th floor.  the pool was also clean.
it's not far from nusa dua beach. there is a free bus shuttle to bali collection nusa dua, or you can order taxi from the hotel, the cost to the beach is about Rp 30k, you can give 50k inc tipping.

text:
We arrived on May 20 at Mahogany Hotel for a week long getaway to celebrate my partner's 21st.  

Yet before that, Ilma and the team at Mahogany Hotel had already gone well out of their way for us - arranging petals spelling his name and 21 on the bed; arranging a hotel rep to pick us up air Denpasar Airport, and replying to my note seeking a higher floor room with water views.

Staff had genuine smiles constantly at the ready, and made us feel like welcome guests in their very own home.  The owner greeted us by name whenever he saw us, and they brought out a pre-arranged cake at brekky, with chocolate-worded writing on a huge plate.  Who does this kind of thing??!!

Add all this to super-chilled out music, pool side couches, awesome in-house menu, and daily room service - together with all the concierge goodness you would expect in a six star hotel - and really, you've got it made at Mahogany Hotel.  Also the property is brand-new, positioned centrally between Nusa Dua beaches and Kuta.

Thanks for an unforgettable stay!!!  

DEFINITELY RETURNING, DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED.
title: Personality, hospitality, A+ treatment = perfect.

text:
Booked in for 3 nights on our tour of Bali.  The hotel is modern in design, clean and well presented with a sports bar, a roof top bar with lovely views and a seating/eating area along the edge of their pool.  The pool was large enough for a decent frolic and nice to relax in and enjoy a beer after a day out.  But it is quite shallow.  We chose a room with a balcony which gave us views of the Bali Mandara Toll Road or Nusa Dua-Ngurah Rai-Benoa Toll Road which is a toll road carried by a bridge stretching across the Gulf of Benoa.

Our room was very well appointed with a really large comfortable bed, large flat screen TV, a small balcony and a modern bathroom with a great shower.  The room was functional, practical and everything worked well.  The AC was excellent.

Breakfast was poolside and served with coffee or tea and help your self to juice.  Breakfast was standard but got us off to a nice start to the day.  The room was cleaned very well each day.

As others have mentioned, this hotel is not in a tourist area so to get around you would need your own bike/car or to use taxis.  The staff were enthusiastic and extremely helpful and went out of their way to help ensure all our needs were met and that the hotel did not disappoint.  They were excellent.  The hotel is cheap for its quality and if it was in a tourist area would be much more expensive.  Top marks for a great stay!
title: Friendly, Clean & Modern.

text:
we booked for five nights to get some quiet time, bit of luxury on a budget. Hotel is beautifully presented, the styling is lovely, the sports bar made us feel like we were in Melbourne as it seems on trend, I thought the breakfast variety was great (my companions don't eat 'non breakfast' food at breakfast, so they didn't enjoy it as much). A birthday was celebrated by my friend, and they served a special plate of food to us, sang happy birthday accompanied by banging pots and pans, gave her a personalised plate of chocolate mousse, and generally spoiled her and us rotten! 

Rooms very nice, comfy bed, INTERNATIONAL power points YOU LITTLE BEAUTY!!!! No need for this Aussie to carry a charger!!! Bathroom clean, air con good but a little noisy (used ear plugs to sleep...but I'm a very light sleeper), small fridge and safe. 

Only downside for us was the lack of depth in the pool. Friend is over six foot/1.83m and the 1.2m deep end was a let down. Even me, at 1.7m found it awkward. Discovered that underneath/ downstairs from pool is a carpark...I think it hampered the pool design! But still clean and ok to float in. No actual swimming to be done. 
LOCATION fine, need taxi to get around, but that's dirt cheap. No drama.

All in all I would definitely recommend, as long as a shallow pool doesn't turn you off.
title: Excellent management and staff, friendly and helpful.

The food quality was poor considering what they charge. The coffee was included in one of the a la carte breakfast dishes, and we were charged separately. It also took them 35 mins to deliver the dishes. Were they busy? NO. The two of us were the only people with a la carte, and three other people having buffet. Slow service. 

Never again.
title: Below average

i took superior room, nice room, very clean and complete facilities. they also have a balcony, if you want to relax and feel Bali's breeze, just sit at the balcony. 
if you want to see the sea view, you can move to the rooftop. it's very peaceful. 
on the rooftop, they provide a lounge and beautiful wedding chapel. 
the swimming pool is very small, but i don't mind. it's very nice swimming pool. 
friendly and helpful staffs. 

i definitely go back to this hotel again.

text:
It's a small new well put together property with a sports bar with a pool table we ended up using a lot and a roof top bar(which is not operational yet, which was a pity).

The service level was excellent and the food at the sports bar was surprisingly good. The sea view from the room is decent.

While it is in Nusa Dua location is bit of a challenge since it's far from the beach, though the hotel provides free pick up & drop at designated times, on the flip side it's a shortish commute to Kuta, Legian & Jimbaran and the reception will call blue bird taxi for you which arrive promptly and are very reasonably priced

text:
Me and my husband had to transit over at bali for one night early January 2015. We find this hotel very clean and tidy which is what I expected from a hotel. It has a new minimalist concept room. The size of the room is comfortable with an added bonus of balcony which was nice. The staffs are very nice and welcoming. I love the view at night. We could see the beautiful lights on the long bridge that extends to the ocean. 
Another thing I love about this hotel is how it's located strategically close to the airport and freeway  but somehow you cannot hear the noise. The top floor have a great view with peace and quite surroundings, perfect for unwinding.
Overall, It's a great hotel with value for money. I would recommend this hotel.

text:
It was a last minute booking for us as most hotels were fully occupied. We were lucky to have discovered this spanking brand new boutique hotel and stayed for a night on NYE. Our room was on first floor facing the pool, but somehow it wasn’t noisy. Really LOVE how this hotel makes use of high ceiling. Our room is a standard one and actually the size is not big. With the use of high ceiling, it changes the feel of it. Feels luxurious some how.  Oh yes, it comes with a balcony too! Cosy bed, good tv channels. We had the NYE dinner and it was gooood. The live band performance was also very very enjoyable, singing great songs. The whole atmosphere was very relaxing, which was a pleasant surprise. The friendly owners were also on site, constantly checking on things and customers. On its website, it claims to be a budget hotel. But frankly, im quite confused. Why? Because it is not. It does exudes some luxurious chic feel! I would say, maybe they can improve a little bit more on the breakfast – That’s the only thing that makes it feel budget. Hehehehe.
Anyway, we were told that they were opened for business sometime on the last week of December. As it is their teething period, the lift wasn’t functioning and the shuttle service was unavailable as yet. 

We had a great stay. I may come back.
title: Good hotel, great stay!

after a tiring flight, it’s great to meet the friendly staff that served welcome drink for us.

text: This hotel is good for transit n business trip. Since we were there during the pandemic, it was not too crowded. We didn't taste the foods since we choosed room only. The receptionist was not on the table when we got there. The security was also not at the post, maybe te management reduced the workers due to low business. The premise n rooms were clean tho...

text:
We stayed in a spacious family room which has a water view. The room is very clean & the beds are comfortable. The foods are delicious both from breakfast as well as ordering from the Homerun Sport cafe. 
The staffs are very friendly & helpful. Parking is available at the hotel. Swimming pool is very clean & well maintained.
The location of the hotel is just a stone's throw away from the highway which goes to airport & other locations like Sanur & Kuta. Supermarket is walking distance.
Highly recommend this place & we will definitely stay here again whenever we go back.
title: Great stay at Mahogany Hotel

text: Dropped an email a week before our visit to ensure everything was smooth as we were on our anniversary and we get checked in to a twin bedded room which was facing the building next door even though on check in we were told it faces the ocean. Came back down and told the receptionist, who in the first place never confirmed the bed type on arrival, who in return says we don't have any more rooms. I told her about the mail I sent and asked to speak to the manager, she comes back later saying that they did not receive the email due to fault in the internet! What sort of a lame excuse is that? And I guess the manager was too busy to even come and say a word as the new "upgraded" room was given by the receptionist only.  The breakfast was alright and the staff were on point, the lady on the egg counter was always helpful and smiling. The a la carte menu isn't that great, we ordered a red velvet cake which was hard and not fresh. And the mini burgers ain't that great too. The guy who helped us get a bike on rent was very efficient and professional. Rooms are small but cosy.

Drawbacks - breakfast left a lot to be desired and the location on a busy road wasn't the best. Not the place to be if you like to walk to explore. Taxis are cheap however so getting around is not a huge problem. Tip: Ask for a room overlooking the pool, ours overlooked a wall! Overall a nice little hotel to use as a base.
title: Clean, pleasant boutique hotel, nice ambience but not the greatest location.

owner_response.text:
Dear Alan E., 

Thank you for the review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted to know that you had a pleasant 5 days stay with your wife at our property. It's such a great news knowing that all of our staff treated you exceptionally well, and you were satisfied with the level of cleanliness at our property , as well as the quaint poolside. We will definitely improve our breakfast, and apologies regarding our location on a busy road. 

Thank you again for your review, and please don't hesitate to contact us in the near future if you happen to visit Bali again.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I have no negative comments on this hotel. 

I stayed here for four days and found it very satisfactory. The hotel is located on the main road and very easily accessible from the DPS Airport. My check-in process was smooth, the receptionists are nice. The staff always smile at you. Although, I had very little interaction with the staff but they seem so nice. 

The hotel has a small but clean pool. The buffet breakfast was reasonable, and the cleanliness standard was good. They have a balcony with every room, and smokers are allowed to smoke in the balcony. 

Restaurants and coffee shops are close to the hotel. Other South Bali's attractions are not much far from the hotel. The hotel is not far from Nusa Dua beach. The TripAdvisor ratings of this hotel, seems appropriate to me. I'll recommend this hotel for a short stay and visitors on a budget travelling.
title: An excellent basic hotel

owner_response.text:

text: After a long flight and not sleeping for most of it was looking forward to getting in to the hotel, reviews hadn't been too bad but when my husband and I thought OMG! It is very dirty outside from the street.  The reception area is clean and staff could not be nicer. The room itself was clean as was the bathroom, when we had a shower there was water everywhere as the door to the shower didn't close properly.  The sheets and towels were in a bit of a poor state, although clean looked a shade of grey.  Our balcony faced on to another block of flats where two dogs barked everytime we went out.  The pool area was clean and no issues with it.  The breakfast that was included was okay, but you could ask for fresh eggs and bacon to be cooked. As I said before the staff were very nice, polite and helpful.
title: Bali holiday

text:
We stayed at the Mahogany hotel in Nusa Dua as part of a stay and cruise holiday. This hotel is on a  busy road but once inside it is relatively quiet. It has a reasonable pool and breakfast is a buffet style. There are plenty of restaurants within a short cab ride and whilst the hotel is not expensive, the restaurants outside do give value for money. There is a free shuttle service to the shopping centre and a visit to the Regis Hotel for afternoon/high tea in the King Cole bar should be on your list of things to do. 
The reason for a 4 and not 5 is that the little things could be done better( enough tea/coffee , number of towels etc) but don’t let that put you off , if you want a reasonable hotel, that is in a more traditional part of Bali, then this won’t dissappoint.
title: Great hotel

text:
Mahogany Hotel situated in Nusa Dua is easy to get to.  When I arrived I found the front entrance very grand and was greeted straight away by the front desk staff.  As the person I was meant to meet was not yet there, I was invited to go to the bar. It was beautiful and well set out with a very fun and friendly atmosphere.  I decided to check out the roof top wedding chapel area.  OMG how special was that ?? Its a complete glass separate styled wedding chapel - but could also be used for various other events. The view is awesome and overlooks the ocean, it also caters for a reception on the rooftop as well, complete with a bar, this all also overlooks the ocean....stunning

The pool is centrally located in the main building area with cane furniture for a relaxing cocktail by the pool.  What I especially liked about the hotel was its beautiful stone and woodwork downstairs, all blending in so well together.  The owner advises me that it was named the "Mahogany" as previously on the site before the hotel was built - there were all Mahogany trees growing there and this is what he has incorporated into the main building.

The menu was bountiful.  The pizza was delicious (wanted more !) and the entree - supburb.....The staff here were all so very helpful and friendly, like nothing was too much trouble for them. The hotel was very clean and inviting.

I would DEFINATELY recommend staying at this hotel either just for a relaxing place to stay for a holiday or for a wedding (or any other event for that matter) I understand that the owners daughter goes to any length to make your wedding day something special and knows where to go to get everything that you could need for the occasion and will organise it all for you. 

I will definately be staying here on my next visit again.
title: BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO STAY....

text:
This hotel and its fantastic team of staff truly deserve the full five stars ***** 

Nothing is too much trouble, literally every member of staff that we met was so warm, welcoming, helpful and friendly. The level of English spoken was excellent and we had no problems communicating with anyone. 

The price we paid, which included breakfast was fantastic value for money. The food at breakfast time and the meals we purchased from their Home Run Sports Cafe were far better than we expected. Alcoholic drink prices were very reasonable too. 

It’s not near the beach but a courtesy drop and pick up service is provided (15 mins drive), plus we had no problem in sorting out taxis at other times. All the transport picked up/dropped off in the foyer of the hotel. 

I used the hotel’s laundry service and it was fine - if you drop off by 9am it’s back by 6pm, if you request the service later in the day, then it’s back the following day. 

The hotel pool is clean and well looked after and often you are the only person swimming/laying by the pool. Pool towels are provided. One area that could do with improving is the purchase of new sun beds/waterproof cushions. There are six sun beds, but only three cushions, which have all seen better days and were often wet/damp. A day bed was also broken. Spruce up the pool furniture to reflect the great decor in rest of this fabulous hotel. 

Thanks for a brilliant week - David and Nichola :)
title: We have no hesitation recommending this hotel

text: The hotel itself is very nice, with a good structure, the pool is good and half of it is more shallow for kids. The room was almost perfectly clean, because there was a strain of hair in the bathroom sink in the first day, however, every time they cleaned the room for us during the stay it was perfect and the sheets were also very clean. A special thanks to the staff, every one very committed in helping us out and with a genuine smile! We would like to say we appreciate how the front desk treated us, Eka and Doni were great and also Sri, who served us during our romantic dinner and on our last breakfast, also very gentle.  The location itself is not so good because it is on a busy avenue but you can find a lot of ATMs and markets nearby, and the fact that the hotel has a free shuttle to a mall inside Nusa Dua complex and close to the beach is a huge plus. I have to say that the hotel was very well organized, the manager Tessa promptly answered me every email I sent before the stay, and it was everything ready when we checked in.
title: Great staff!

text: We spent three nights at the Mahogany hotel - a modern property on the byepass. We were impressed by the friendly staff and great service. The hotel has a nice poolside bar called the Homerun Sport Cafe with a billiards table. This is where we had our dinners over a favourite Bintang Radler. While most menu items are good, we particularly liked the Balinese crispy pork with rice and the Pepperoni pizza - a classic. Breakfast is mainly Indonesian and good.The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Bali Collection from where you can walk to the Nusa Dua beach, the Water Blow and the Nusa Dua theatre for the Devdan show. On one of those days, we felt particularly energetic and walked all the way to the adjoining Gregar beach.

text:
It's my third time visiting Bali and staying in this hotel again. And yes, my third time writing this review. 

This time i tried to stay in different locations and different hotels and decided to stay here for the last two nights. 

I couldn't be any happier being back to my first home in Bali. It warms my heart knowing that one reception staff still remembers me and my mom despite being here more than a year ago. 

Even though the previous two hotels i stayed at were both high-end five star hotels, here is where I had the most comfortable sleep during my holiday. 

The staff both old and new faces are kind, patient and always smiling to my requests. The breakfast which has always been my favorite is tasty, fresh and healthy. Maybe its just me but one thing i kinda got sad about is the sea view I used to see from the restaurant during breakast is now covered with plants. If someone could tell me why I'd be happy because the view of the sea adds to the ambience to be honest. 

Other than that, it was definitely nice comfortable stay. It feels good to see either things remained awesome as they are and some additions/improvements to details. 

I seemed like finally coming home after exploring different locations. Two nights felt rather fast. I wish i could've stayed longer this time. 

I'd be happy to return and spend some relaxing time here in the near future. Thank you so much for welcoming me back
title: Happy to be back!

text:
As a positive person I am going to start with what is good about the place. 
Pros:
Room was good size, with aircon, hot water shower and tv (although no english channels except news)
Breakfast buffet was ok. Mostly indonesian food, but thats where we are so all good!
We were allowed to check out an hour late.. always appreciated! 

However, I have to warn other travellers about some serious issues here. 
Cons:
Literally conned. We talked to a staff member about where to eat explaining it was our last night after 7 months of travelling around SE asia. He said he recommended a place, hidden away that we wouldn't be able to find otherwise. We were hesitant but he came off so friendly arranging free pick up and drop off from the hotel. Needless to say, the place was a complete rip off and the food horrible. Ended up paying over 700,000 rupiah for the biggest con of 7 months of travelling. The receptionist then avoided us, conveniently always on the phone when we walked past. He must have got commission and knew we would not enjoy ourselves. 
Secondly, hotel free shuttle is a joke if you want to stay out after 7pm. This hotel is in the middle of nowhere on a bypass. It is about 5km from the beach. Super busy road but no local restaurants. So taxis is a must. Or hire a motorbike from the hotel at 50% more than everywhere else in bali. The pool area/ breakfat area looks onto the busy road, (no seperating walls) which isn't shown in any pictures, so be warned no relaxation possible due to the constant noise.
And finally, we ate once in the hotel restaurant. Food is crazily overpriced for the quality and quantity of food received. See attached pic for what a portion of fries looks like for ~60,000 rupiah. 

So to conclude, although reasonable price at first glance, it is NOT value for money and definitely not worth going out pf your way to stay here. Please look critically at some of the previous reviews as they MUST be fake. So disappointing and deceiving.
title: Disappointed disappointed disappointed

owner_response.text:

Hot shower, good AC , preferred TV with a USB but that's ok. 
Bed was super comfy with large pillows . Quiet room with pool view

Fridge was real mini and not working so they asked if we could shift to another room and we obliged 

Staff were friendly .The rooms have a large square balcony with a pool view 
Breakfast options were average. 
For the price I've paid its a very good deal.
The reading light next to the bed is useful if u like to read in the bed 
Pool is nice and large enough for a dip. 
Over all a very pleasant experience staying at this " boutique hotel" in Bali.

text: 2 chambres de  réservées, une des 2 était dans un état de saleté pitoyable, en plus d'une chasse d'eau qui fuit, beaucoup de perte d'eau ! signalé mais rien n'a été fait, un frigo vide qui ne fonctionne pas ! j'avais choisi cet hôtel pour le frigo car étant diabétique, je dois conserver mon insuline au frais, à Bali les températures sont à 30 ! signalé mais frigo pas changé... J'ai dû descende à la réception pour signaler l'état innommable de crasse trouvé !!! voir mes photos car en déplaçant mon lit ( j'avais fais tombé mon stylo insuline)  c'était dégueulasse  très très sale, sous le lit j'avais de tout des bouts de papier des gros morceaux de plastique des cartons d'invitation des cure-dents des bouchons de flacons enfin c'était 1 an sans ménage sous les lits ?? petit déjeuner très très très léger au niveau du choix . c'est bruyant dans l'hôtel , travaux? balcon avec une seule chaise, le personnel est gentil c'est tout c'est un hôtel à fuir

text: お部屋の中は、とても快適で清潔でした。アメニティが少ないのでシャンプー等はホテルから徒歩2分もかからないスーパーで購入しました。タオルは清潔でしたが、少し古いようで硬かった。それ以外は、エアコンも良く効きテレビの映りも良く、シャワーのお湯も十分でした。バスタブはありません。ファミリースイート（＃206）を2泊利用。ベッドからべノア湾が一望でき、日の出は部屋によっては良く見えるかもしれません。ベランダでタバコ吸えます。私達の部屋は、隣のPOPホテル側だったので、ファミリースイートの後ろ側の1棟は、ベランダに出て最初に見えるのは、POPホテルの壁です。チャックインの際に、海を見たい方は、部屋を聞て＃201～＃205なら変えてもらう方がいいと思います。プールですが、初日　プールの底に藻が沈んでいるのを見て、子供達に入るのをやめさせました。翌朝、朝食を食べに行く際にプールを確認しましたが、前日よりも藻が増えていて、誰もプールに入っていませんでした。昼過ぎ、再度　子供達にせかされプールを見に行くと、水面に白く膜が浮いていて、とてもは入れる状況ではありませんでした。2泊3日の間、一度もプールに入れず子供達は残念な顔をしていました。
title: プールが残念すぎる

text:
按照事先邮件联系好的酒店接机服务，很快就找到了手举我姓名标牌的接机师傅，蛮热情的，主动帮我们搬运行李，不到30分钟，就把我们接到了第一天入住的巴厘岛红木酒店。接机费用是事先就谈好的RP150,000。（相当于人民币75元左右）
大厅不算太大，也不豪华，但是干净整洁。有沙发休息区和公用电脑上网区，巴厘岛红木酒店的免费WiFi网速还可以，比较流畅。木制的弧形前台，简洁环保。前台小妹和帅锅的服务非常热情仔细，在填写入住手续时就送上了冰镇的果汁，凉爽到心（巴厘岛温度26—31°C，偏闷热。）现场办理入住可以刷国际信用卡的。
前台详细的提示应该填写的事项，仔细的说明了入住客房的位置/早餐时间和地点以及退房时间。
入住的湾景家庭套房是巴厘岛红木酒店最好的客房了，可以俯瞰泳池，房间转角玻璃窗和阳台也可以270度观景。客房有50多平米，全面原木的装饰风格，简洁素雅是其特色。有点类似家庭套房，有一大一小两张床，三口之家入住而已很合适。睡床很舒适的，柔软度适中。布草都是没有漂白的，很环保的洗涤方式。
有大尺寸的液晶电视，桌上有电视频道收视表，有带转椅的书写台。房间的空调制冷很快，就是晚上声音有点吵。
有专门的对座吧台，适合坐下来慢品聊天。
卫浴间不大，五平米左右，干净整洁，考虑了干湿分区。
泳池边的早餐是7：30—9：30，品种很多，而且会不断的添加，保持数量。服务也很温馨。中午12点退房的时候，询问下个酒店的位置和前往方式，前台帅锅主动给我们打需要入住的酒店的电话，请他们来接客人......服务真是很棒，推荐自费自助游不追求豪华品质的客人选择入住。
title: 服务很赞，视线很好。

owner_response.text:

我们希望这个美好的回忆能够在不久的将来再次回归你。

请保持联系！

红木精品酒店

text:
Hemos estado unos 10 días alojados en este hotel y hemos quedado encantados. El personal del hotel es muy servicial y amable. Es un hotel pequeñito, no cuenta con muchos servicios, únicamente la piscina, que es muy agradable y que está abierta hasta las 10 de la noche (cosa que aprovechamos mucho durante nuestra estancia ya que el clima invita a bañarte hasta la noche). Las habitaciones están muy limpias (como el resto del hotel) y son bastante amplias. El desayuno tipo buffet está bastante bien, no es demasiado grande pero en general está todo bastante rico y además, el horario es muy amplio desde las 7 a las 11 de la mañana. 
La única pega que se le podría poner a este hotel es la distancia a la playa, aunque dispone de un transfer gratuito a la playa mas cercana. De todas formas, en el hotel siempre hay choferes que te pueden acercar al sitio que quieras, nosotros siempre nos movíamos por diferentes playas por un precio aceptable (siendo 5 personas nos salía a 2-3 euros por cabeza).
Por lo tanto, sin duda recomendaría este hotel.
title: Estancia perfecta

owner_response.text:
Estimada Eva R.,

Gracias por su comentario en Tripadvisor. Nos alegramos de que parece tener un buen tiempo en Mahogany Boutique Hotel durante su estancia de 10 días, y nuestra piscina junto a la piscina. Sin duda pasará sus felicitaciones a nuestro equipo de limpieza con respecto a habitaciones amplias y limpias, así como el sabroso desayuno buffet.

Gracias de nuevo y esperamos que podamos darle la bienvenida nuevamente en el futuro.

Mahogany Boutique Hotel

text: je suis arrivée pour 2 nuits dans cet hotel, tout était très bien jusqu à ce que je veuille réserver 2 nuits de plus ( tellement bien que je voulais rester) , après avoir vu avec le front office pour la disponibilité de 2 nuits supp, il m annonce un prix supérieur à celui de booking.com, je lui dis que je vais donc réserver par booking puis il me dit qu il va se renseigner auprès de sa manager et qu à mon retour le soir, il aura une réponse de tarif, je pars donc de l hotel vers 14:00 et reviens vers 19:00 et comme convenu je vais le voir et il me dit qu il peut me proposer le tarif qu il m'a annoncé le midi. je lui ai dis ok je vais donc réserver sur booking. il me dit ok.  je vais sur le site et là, super surprise , l hotel est plein ! alors que quelques heures plus tôt je lui avais dit que je souhaitais rester et qu il avait bien compris que je restais puisqu il devait me rendre une réponse de tarif vs le prix de booking !!! il me dit " ah oui désolé on a un groupe qui a réservé entre temps plusieurs chambres ". et bah dis donc, quel service ... il restait des chambres au double de prix, des suites,  le vrai service aurait été de me proposer un de ces chambres au meme tarif au moins pr 1 seule nuit, le temps que je trouve autre chose, mais non. vraiment déçue. vraiment dommage comme épisode. au final c est moi qui me suis retrouvée en galère à devoir booker autre chose sachant que c est pas mal plein en ce moment à nusa dua , à 20:00 pour le lendemain. à part des " sorry", je n ai pas eu ni réduction, ni prix sur la food ou meme le chauffeur de l hotel qui me dépose au nouvel hotel que j ai réussi à trouver .... bref. aucun geste ni aide. je ne l attendais pas mais au moins le proposer aurait été sympa ... un hotel bien noté sur tous les sites ne peut pas agir ainsi. Dire que c est dispo puis 5h plus tard dire que finalement c est plein ... n importe quoi. avec de telles notes sur tous les sites, on ne comprend pas que cela puisse se passer . j ai fait 2 autres hôtels dans la même gamme de prix à nusa dua pendant 1 mois ( le ion hotel benoa et l amaroossa, le service a été excellent  ). vraiment pas contente de la presta.
title: très bien au début puis déception

owner_response.text:
Chère Anne ,

Merci d'avoir choisi Mahogany Hotel Nusa Dua lors de votre voyage à Bali.

Tout d'abord, nous aimerions vous présenter des excuses car cet incident tainted votre expérience à Mahogany Hotel Nusa Dua. Nous pouvons nous assurer que nous n'avons rien voulu dire par cela, et regretter profondément nos actions qui sont perçues pas bien
Cependant, nous aimerions souligner que notre réception ne peut pas réserver une chambre sans aucun paiement comme une norme de procédure. Ainsi, quand aucun dépôt n'est reçu, aucune pièce ne serait bloquée.
Nous allons continuer à former notre personnel pour le dire plus clairement la prochaine fois donc cette série d'événements et dissapointments ne se reproduira pas.

Nous espérons néanmoins que cela vous aidera dans vos recherches. Original en anglais Language Weaver Notez cette traduction: Merci pour votre évaluation Mauvaise Bonne

Mahogany Boutique Hotel
